name: To Get to the Golden Kernel
name_original: To Get to the Golden Kernel
description:
You awaken on the farm one morning and are horrified by what you see! Chickens so round, they can't even move! You decide enough is enough and that you will not become one of them. After hearing rumors of an elusive chicken looking for some mysterious road, you make your decision...

The details are slim, but you must make your escape and find the road for yourself, it could be your only salvation!
